inputs.remark: 缺少 V2 (1 year follow up)；V1 缺少 DR* 的结果。

logic_summary: Added Dichotic Rhyme (DR*) results (~40%) to the Central Auditory Processing Battery in V1 based on Figure 6-18.
Added V2 (1 year follow-up) to document the subjective recovery and lack of formal testing as described in the text.

patch_ops.value: Dichotic Rhyme scores were significantly reduced (~40%). Bilateral deficits on Dichotic Digits (~70-75%) and Frequency Patterns (<60%). Compressed speech showed a slight left ear deficit (~70%) compared to the right (~85%).

value.collective_interpretation: At 1 year follow-up, the patient was asymptomatic and back at work. Subjectively, she reported no hearing difficulties. Formal follow-up audiologic testing could not be completed due to logistical reasons.
